name: Asteroids: Definitive Edition
description:
What's out of control?

These asteroids, certainly. But I digress.

YOUR SHIP, is out of control. Barely functioning, you can't control all of its systems

Targeting - Broken

Steering - Broken

Life Support - Broken

Retro-Thrusters - Broken

Shields - Broken

Sensors - Broken

You might be able to scrap some repairs together along the way, but its unlikely you have the power to support more than two.

Can you make it out in time, before you life support runs out!?

Or never runs out (if you repair it).

Credits:

Director (lol): Tesla Radulović

Game Concept: Tesla Radulović, Christopher Phillip Wasylowsky, & Maxwell Scherer

Programming: Tesla Radulović

Art and Music: Maxwell Scherer

Play Testing: Christopher Phillip Wasylowsky & Maksym Marek

Font: https://www.fontspace.com/glasstown-nbp-font-f14742

Sounds: https://opengameart.org/content/nes-8-bit-sound-effects

Special Thanks To:

Mark Brown - For creating GMTK

Martin Odersky - For Creating Scala

Sébastien Doeraene - For Creating Scala.js
